channel.title: Webclient Cache help Matrix
channel.description:
I created a server with the NrS3server souce and matrix 667 client. I finally got it working so that it will load properly in a web browser but seems to hang at 53% Fetching updates. Going to let it run over night and see if its just taking for ever to download the cache. I looked up the cache location and can see the mian_file_cache.dat2 file growing slowly. Has anyone else ran into this issue or maybe point me in another direction for a client that will load faster. Also if I try and place the cache in the folder it seems to delete it.
Thanks in Advance

item.title: Webclient Cache help Matrix
item.dc:creator: @trueae77 trueae77
item.description:
@trueae77 wrote:

Yeah no I can’t seem to get the matrix client that he posted to work at all…The 1 I was use was the disturbed client but it doesn’t seem to load properly I get no sound. I left it over night and it did finally load but It shouldn’t take 5 hours.

Any ideas on why I can’t the matrix667 client to create a web version ?

Read full topic
